definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: Van Gogh’s work became more youthful in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎凡高的作品變得更加青春洋溢。

sentences.english: The Van Gogh failed to reach its reserve and was withdrawn.
sentences.chinese: 凡高的畫因出價未達拍賣底價而收回。

sentences.english: She acquired an original painting by van gogh.
sentences.chinese: 她得到了凡高的一幅原作。

sentences.english: Van Gogh left the perfect spot for a pug puppy to stretch out for a spring nap.
sentences.chinese: 凡高留下了哈巴狗小狗的完美地點小睡的伸展出一春。

sentences.english: Assuming that this painting really is Van Gogh, how much do you think it's worth?
sentences.chinese: 假如這幅畫真是凡高的，你認爲知多少錢啊？

sentences.english: The museum is trying to raise enough money to purchase a painting by Van Gogh.
sentences.chinese: 博物館正在設法籌集足夠的資金以購買一幅凡高的畫。

sentences.english: Van Gogh is one of the greatest artists in the history.
sentences.chinese: 凡高是歷史上偉大的藝術家之一。

definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter (Tw)
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
